com.twitter.heron.streamlet.impl.operators

Class StreamletWindowOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.api.bolt.BaseWindowedBolt
      • com.twitter.heron.streamlet.impl.operators.StreamletWindowOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWindowedBolt, IComponent, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralReduceByKeyAndWindowOperator, JoinOperator, ReduceByKeyAndWindowOperator

    public abstract class StreamletWindowOperator
extends BaseWindowedBolt
    The Bolt interface that other windowed operators of the streamlet packages extend. The only common stuff amongst all of them is the output streams
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • declareOutputFields

        public void declareOutputFields(OutputFieldsDeclarer outputFieldsDeclarer)
        The operators implementing streamlet functionality have some properties. 1. They all output only one stream 2. They should be able to consume each other's output This imply that the output stream should be named same for all of them.
        Specified by:
        declareOutputFields in interface IComponent
        Overrides:
        declareOutputFields in class BaseWindowedBolt
        Parameters:
        outputFieldsDeclarer - this is used to declare output stream ids, output fields, and whether or not each output stream is a direct stream
